page.title: 16SOUTHPORT FLOWER SHOW
page.content: The Southport Flower Show takes place during August.It is situated on Victoria Park near Rotten Row.There are alot of tents and many prizes are given for the nicest arrangment,the most unusual plants and so on.As well as plants there are vegetables and copies of garden designs.The people who grow the flowers come from all over the country and sometimes abroad. People who come to see the flowers come from all over the world.In the show there are events taking place like show jumping and aerobatic displays. Within the grounds there are also different adverts for companies eg.Rothmans Cigarettes,Dunlop Tyres and other companies. The show lasts for only 3 days because by then the flowers start to wilt and die.
